QuestData.Title: Maintaining Discipline
QuestData.Description: You've succeeded where others have failed. Yet you cannot rest on your laurels.$B$BYou must show others what strength and commitment really mean.$B$BThe male insubordinates inside the Forlorn Mine need to be disciplined once again. Show them sister... show them what it means to disobey us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gretta the Arbiter in Brunnhildar Village wants you to use the Disciplining Rod on 6 Exhausted Vrykul inside the Forlorn Mine.
QuestData.RewardText: You continue to lead by example. We look up to you, sister.
